PathOfBuilding.Notes: Note: Specters rarely die, but almost always do in Sirus AW8. Dropping them from the build is not a big deal as its OP AF from the word go. Frenzy Charges are very powerful for minions but honestly the build is so strong that if their occasional death annoys you you can just compleatly drop them.
